sentence.Network_en: All traitorous persons and cliques came to no good end.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的叛徒及叛徒集团都没好下场.

sentence.Network_en: Most of the time I keep such traitorous thoughts to myself.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种叛逆思想我不大向别人暴露.

sentence.Network_en: The assassination attempt that failed in July 1944 was witless and traitorous.
sentence.Network_cn: 1944年7月以失败而告终的那个暗杀企图即无头脑,又失信义.

because of this " traitorous " crime , my grandparents , father and uncle back in the North were found of treason and crimes against the state , and were arrested .就因为他们叛逃之罪，我祖父母，我父亲和回朝鲜的叔叔都被认为犯有叛国以及颠覆国家等罪行，遭到逮捕。

entry.def: A traitorous action will betray or bring danger to a country or to the group of people that someone belongs to.

example.ex: ...the monstrous betrayal of men by their most traitorous companions.
example.tran: 最为背信弃义的同伴对他们令人发指的出卖

example.ex: ...the movement could be labeled as divisive, even traitorous.
example.tran: 该运动可以被称作是分裂性的，甚至是背叛性的。

means.word_mean: 1. deliberately and abominably disloyal or likely to betray trust or confidence;

auth_sentence.content: The suppression of deviant views as traitorous and unpatriotic.
auth_sentence.res_content: The suppression of deviant views as traitorous and unpatriotic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The suppression of deviant views as traitorous and unpatriotic.

auth_sentence.content: It would be traitorous of me to leave my upbringing behind.
auth_sentence.res_content: It would be traitorous of me to leave my upbringing behind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would be traitorous of me to leave my upbringing behind.

auth_sentence.content: In one of his columns, he suggested that conservatives were traitorous.
auth_sentence.res_content: In one of his columns, he suggested that conservatives were traitorous.
